transArray.content: The hotel is in an alley. If you drive there, you can get free parking if you report your license plate number. The service is very good and the hotel environment is nice. When I went there, there were oranges to eat, and I was given a Sprite and a Coke. The check-in experience was quite good. The key is the cleanliness of the hotel. I don't think anything else is as important as this.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel front desk and the room ladies. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. , cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay. Thank you. ! General Manager: Li Changxia
